languages.text: "Так и быть, я стану палачом для твоих трехоких собратьев, мон-кай. Но не думай, что тебе рады на Первом Мире. Ты вол{mf|ен|ьна} уйти сразу же, как закончится песнь по погибшим. И лишь потому, что {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}некоторые из моих братьев и сестер считают тебя занятн{mf|ым|ой}{/d}". {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n} "А теперь... пришло время финальной сцены".

traits.locale_text: "Так и быть, я стану палачом для твоих трехоких собратьев, мон-кай. Но не думай, что тебе рады на Первом Мире. Ты вол{mf|ен|ьна} уйти сразу же, как закончится песнь по погибшим. И лишь потому, что некоторые из моих братьев и сестер считают тебя занятн{mf|ым|ой}". {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n} "А теперь... пришло время финальной сцены".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Very well, mon-keigh. I will play the role of executioner for your three-eyed kin. But do not think that you are welcome on the Crone World. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}." {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically and presses a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "And now... it is time for the closing scene."
languages.original_text: "Так и быть, я стану палачом для твоих трехоких собратьев, мон-кай. Но не думай, что тебе рады на Первом Мире. Ты вол{mf|ен|ьна} уйти сразу же, как закончится песнь по погибшим. И лишь потому, что {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}некоторые из моих братьев и сестер считают тебя занятн{mf|ым|ой}{/d}". {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n} "А теперь... пришло время финальной сцены".

traits.locale_text: "Very well, mon-keigh. I will play the role of executioner for your three-eyed kin. But do not think that you are welcome on the Crone World. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}." {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically and presses a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "And now... it is time for the closing scene."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「いい判断だよ、モン＝ケイ。僕が三つ目のモン＝ケイの処刑人役を演じよう。だが、老朽惑星に受け入れられるとは思うなよ。葬送歌が聞こえたらさっさと立ち去れ。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}僕の兄弟に、もてあそばれちゃうからね{/d}」{n}ハーレクィンは観客に向けるようなお辞儀をすると、手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンを押す。{/n}「さて…終幕の時間だよ」
languages.original_text: "Very well, mon-keigh. I will play the role of executioner for your three-eyed kin. But do not think that you are welcome on the Crone World. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}." {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically and presses a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "And now... it is time for the closing scene."

traits.locale_text: 「いい判断だよ、モン＝ケイ。僕が三つ目のモン＝ケイの処刑人役を演じよう。だが、老朽惑星に受け入れられるとは思うなよ。葬送歌が聞こえたらさっさと立ち去れ。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}僕の兄弟に、もてあそばれちゃうからね{/d}」{n}ハーレクィンは観客に向けるようなお辞儀をすると、手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンを押す。{/n}「さて…終幕の時間だよ」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “很好，猴子。我愿意扮演刽子手的角色，处决你们这位三眼族人。不过，别以为老妪世界会欢迎你。等到哀歌响起，你们就要离开了。你之所以能活着离开这里，不过是因为{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}我一部分兄弟姐妹觉得你很有趣{/d}罢了。”{n}丑角戏剧性地鞠了个躬，按下了手中古怪装置上的按钮。{/n}“至于现在……谢幕的时间到了。”
languages.original_text: "Very well, mon-keigh. I will play the role of executioner for your three-eyed kin. But do not think that you are welcome on the Crone World. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}." {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically and presses a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "And now... it is time for the closing scene."

traits.locale_text: “很好，猴子。我愿意扮演刽子手的角色，处决你们这位三眼族人。不过，别以为老妪世界会欢迎你。等到哀歌响起，你们就要离开了。你之所以能活着离开这里，不过是因为我的部分兄弟姐妹觉得你很有趣罢了。”{n}丑角戏剧性地鞠了个躬，按下了手中古怪装置上的按钮。{/n}“至于现在……谢幕的时间到了。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Très bien, mon-keigh. Je jouerai donc le rôle de bourreau. Mais n'allez pas croire pour autant que vous êtes {mf|le bienvenu|la bienvenue} sur le monde déchu. Je vous autorise à rester jusqu'au chant funèbre, mais pas au-delà. Et uniquement parce que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}certains de mes semblables vous trouvent {mf|amusant|amusante}{/d}. »{n}L'Arlequin s'incline comme s'il saluait son public puis appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main.{/n} « L'heure du dénouement est venue. »
languages.original_text: "Very well, mon-keigh. I will play the role of executioner for your three-eyed kin. But do not think that you are welcome on the Crone World. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}." {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically and presses a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "And now... it is time for the closing scene."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien, mon-keigh. Je jouerai donc le rôle de bourreau. Mais n'allez pas croire pour autant que vous êtes {mf|le bienvenu|la bienvenue} sur le monde déchu. Je vous autorise à rester jusqu'au chant funèbre, mais pas au-delà. Et uniquement parce que certains de mes semblables vous trouvent {mf|amusant|amusante}. » {n}L'arlequin s'incline comme s'il saluait son public puis appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main.{/n} « L'heure du dénouement est venue. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «De acuerdo, mon-keigh. Representaré el papel de verdugo para tus compañeros de tres ojos, pero no creas que por ello eres bienvenid{mf|o|a} en el mundo ancestral. Lo abandonarás tan pronto como acabe su réquiem, y únicamente porque {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}algunos de mis hermanos y hermanas te consideran interesante{/d}». {n}El Arlequín te dedica una reverencia teatral mientras pulsa el botón del extraño dispositivo que porta en la mano{/n}. «Y ahora... entramos en la última escena».
languages.original_text: "Very well, mon-keigh. I will play the role of executioner for your three-eyed kin. But do not think that you are welcome on the Crone World. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}." {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically and presses a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "And now... it is time for the closing scene."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo, mon-keigh. Representaré el papel de verdugo para tus compañeros de tres ojos, pero no creas que por ello eres bienvenid{mf|o|a} en el mundo ancestral. Lo abandonarás tan pronto como acabe su réquiem, y únicamente porque algunos de mis hermanos y hermanas te consideran interesante». {n}El Arlequín te dedica una reverencia teatral mientras pulsa el botón del extraño dispositivo que porta en la mano.{/n} «Y ahora... entramos en la última escena».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Also schön, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich werde die Rolle eines Henkers für Eure dreiäugigen Verwandten spielen. Aber glaubt nicht, dass Ihr auf der Hexenwelt willkommen seid. Ihr werdet gehen, sobald das Klagelied gesungen ist. Und nur, weil {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}einige meiner Brüder und Schwestern Euch amüsant finden{/d}." {n}Der Harlekin verneigt sich theatralisch und drückt eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand.{/n} "Und nun ... wird es Zeit für die letzte Szene."
languages.original_text: "Very well, mon-keigh. I will play the role of executioner for your three-eyed kin. But do not think that you are welcome on the Crone World. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}." {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically and presses a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "And now... it is time for the closing scene."

traits.locale_text: "Also schön, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich werde die Rolle eines Henkers für Eure dreiäugigen Verwandten spielen. Aber glaubt nicht, dass Ihr auf der Hexenwelt willkommen seid. Ihr werdet gehen, sobald das Klagelied gesungen ist. Und nur, weil einige meiner Brüder und Schwestern Euch amüsant finden." {n}Der Harlekin verneigt sich theatralisch und drückt eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand.{/n} "Und nun ... wird es Zeit für die letzte Szene."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Pekâlâ mon-keigh. Üç gözlü soydaşlarının celladı olacağım. Lakin Acuze Dünya'da hoş karşılandığını sanma. Ağıt sona erer ermez buradan gideceksin. Sırf {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}bazı kardeşlerimi eğlendirdiğin için canını bağışlıyorum{/d}." {n}Sahnedeymişçesine reverans yapan Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp basılı tutuyor.{/n} "Artık... Son perdedeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Very well, mon-keigh. I will play the role of executioner for your three-eyed kin. But do not think that you are welcome on the Crone World. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}." {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically and presses a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "And now... it is time for the closing scene."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ mon-keigh. Üç gözlü soydaşların için cellat rolünü üstleneceğim. Lakin Acuze Dünya'da hoş karşılandığını sanma. Ağıt sona erer ermez buradan gideceksin. Sırf {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}bazı kardeşlerimi eğlendirdiğin için canını bağışlıyorum{/d}." {n}Sahnedeymişçesine reverans yapan Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp basılı tutuyor.{/n} "Artık... Son perdeye geldik."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
